headline: AEP Names Puesh Kumar Vice President of National Security and Resilience
summary: American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) has named Puesh M. Kumar vice president of National Security and Resilience, effective April 9. Kumar will report to Emily Duncan, senior vice president of Federal Affairs, and will be based in the company's Washington, D.C. office.
